QuestData.Title: Holdout at Hunter's Hill
QuestData.Description: Honor's Stand may have been lost, but its spirit was never crushed. Even now survivors are holding out at a point called "Hunter's Hill."$B$BContinue following the high road and you will find our camp just up ahead. Speak with Onatay when you get there and let her know the trail is, for the moment, still clear.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Onatay at Hunter's Hill in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Onatay at Hunter's Hill in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: So the Alliance is probing the twists and turns of the high road?$B$BEven if they were to map it out, they couldn't attack these hills in numbers. This is our land, $n. And they will pay dearly for presuming otherwise.
